profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 17:44:25 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Use of original papers requires an appointment and is limited to the Archives' Washington, D.C., Research Center. Contact Reference Services for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily research material compiled by Schriever for his work on art of the American West, Southwest and by American Indians. Included are papers relating to his efforts to publish writings and purchase work by Emil Bisttram.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Papers relating to Bisttram include: correspondence with Mayrion Bisttram; notes; typescript of Bisttram's "The Creative Process in the New Age" annotated by Schriever; lists of paintings to be reproduced; a clipping on Bisttram, 1984; a catalog for a Bisttram exhibition at the George Nix Gallery, Colorado Springs, Colo., 1973; and a color snapshot of a work by Bisttram.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: ADDITION: Files of research material, primarily photocopies, on exhibitions and artists, containing clippings, catalogs, and some correspondence.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Collector, curator; New York, N.Y. and Denver, Colo. Curator for the Anshutz Corporation art collection.
